definition: border between countries/line forming the border
without borders (used for organizations such as Médecins sans Frontières)
Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF charity)/Doctors Without Borders

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania."
sentences.chinese: 普魯特河形成了整個西部與羅馬尼亞的國界線。

sentences.english: It is a cross-border international river.
sentences.chinese: 是一條跨越國界的河流。

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania.
sentences.chinese: 普魯特河形成了整個西部與羅馬尼亞的國界線。

sentences.english: Its border with Romania follows the Prut and lower Danube rivers.
sentences.chinese: 它與羅馬尼亞的國界沿着普魯特河和多瑙河下游。

sentences.english: DBW helps saving lives and we thought that was pretty cool.
sentences.chinese: 無國界醫生組織協助拯救生命，我們覺得這很棒。

sentences.english: Resource and ecology problems cross national borders, and are ever-escalating on a global scale.
sentences.chinese: 穿越國界，愈趨嚴重的全球性資源及環境問題。

sentences.english: Médecins sans Frontières has also been assisting control efforts in Edo State.
sentences.chinese: 無國界醫生組織也一直在埃多州協助控制工作。

sentences.english: Due to the fictitious character of internet, the actions of crime on the internet usually appeared transnational character.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網的虛擬無國界性使得網絡犯罪呈現跨國性特點。

sentences.english: people got like, international tradition, you know.
sentences.chinese: 人們都很喜歡這種無國界的派對傳統。

sentences.english: I notice that the written word has eliminated not only dialect boundaries but also language and national boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到漢字不僅超越方言區，而且超越了國界。

sentences.english: As with other infectious diseases, the poliovirus does not respect borders.
sentences.chinese: 像其它傳染病一樣，脊髓灰質炎病毒同樣不分國界。

sentences.english: He added, "We now have a transnational media."
sentences.chinese: 他補充說，“我們現在有一個跨越國界的媒體。

sentences.english: Fusion food is a melting pot of cuisines from many cultures.
sentences.chinese: 無國界料理是許多文化的料理的融合體。

sentences.english: Science is a truly global undertaking and its language is English.
sentences.chinese: 科學無國界，它的語言是英語。

sentences.english: The line continued in diminished form under British rule until 1857.
sentences.chinese: 國界線直到1857年英國統治時才逐漸縮小。

definition: (fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
without borders (used for organizations such as Médecins sans Frontières)
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
